item.title: CHWY
item.description: score:156 Chances: Pet care stocks are incredibly effective in diversifying investment portfolios, leveraging the robust growth of the pet care industry. Chewy stock has made exceptional progress in expanding its subscriber base and revenues. Risks: Chewy stock has experienced an endless plunge over the past two years.
